author: slomeo
body:
@ptcox  FYI 4 S13) and all overlpas for Muon System fixed

#### PR description:

New Scenario 2021 with Updated Cavern, MB4Shields for Neutrons (top S4 S13) and all overlpas for Muon System fixed 

#### PR validation:

I perfomed a MC test with few events (20 events Z -> Mu Mu) and it was fine (i.e no errors, no warnings, no crash) in CMSSW_10_5_0 

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR: It is needed for data comparison. I think CMSSW_10_2_2

Before submitting your pull requests, make sure you followed this checklist:
- verify that the PR is really intended for the chosen branch
- verify that changes follow [CMS Naming, Coding, And Style Rules](http://cms-sw.github.io/cms_coding_rules.html)
- verify that the PR passes the basic test procedure suggested in the [CMSSW PR instructions](https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html)
